pull.title: ci: Run iwyu on all src files
pull.body: This makes it easier to look at the CI output of a file without having to manually add it first to the list.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27571#pullrequestreview-1429129896) |
| Concept ACK | [fanquake](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27571#issuecomment-1540384552), [jonatack](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27571#issuecomment-1543705947) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#27636](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27636) (kernel: Remove interface_ui, util/system from kernel library by TheCharlatan)
* [#27576](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27576) (kernel: Remove args, chainparams, chainparamsbase from kernel library by TheCharlatan)
* [#27425](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27425) (test: move remaining rand code from util/setup_common to util/random by jonatack)
* [#27385](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27385) (net, refactor: extract Network and BIP155Network logic to node/network by jonatack)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Yes, I can't figure out how to fight `bash -c`, so I removed it there
Concept ACK on removing the continual manual updating of this list

> (qt/qrc_bitcoin_locale.cpp has correct #includes/fwd-decls)

Looks like it's mostly working, except GUI stuff is still being dragged in

> > (qt/qrc_bitcoin_locale.cpp has correct #includes/fwd-decls)
> 
> Looks like it's mostly working, except GUI stuff is still being dragged in

And `qt/qrc_bitcoin.cpp` as well.
Concept ACK. I've been adding sources files to this list while working on each pull.

ci: Run iwyu on all src files

This makes it easier to look at the CI output of a file without having
to manually add it first.

events.message:
ci: Run iwyu on all src files

This makes it easier to look at the CI output of a file without having
to manually add it first.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -42,51 +42,16 @@ if [ "${RUN_TIDY}" = "true" ]; then
   set -eo pipefail
   cd "${BASE_BUILD_DIR}/bitcoin-$HOST/src/"
   ( run-clang-tidy-16 -quiet "${MAKEJOBS}" ) | grep -C5 "error"
+  # Filter out files by regex here, because regex may not be
+  # accepted in src/.bear-tidy-config
+  # Filter out:
+  # * qt qrc and moc generated files
+  # * walletutil (temporarily)

@@ -42,51 +42,16 @@ if [ "${RUN_TIDY}" = "true" ]; then
   set -eo pipefail
   cd "${BASE_BUILD_DIR}/bitcoin-$HOST/src/"
   ( run-clang-tidy-16 -quiet "${MAKEJOBS}" ) | grep -C5 "error"
+  # Filter out files by regex here, because regex may not be
+  # accepted in src/.bear-tidy-config
+  # Filter out:
+  # * qt qrc and moc generated files
+  # * walletutil (temporarily)
